column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kayleen - Thank you for your review. I regret that your experience with us was tainted due to the extended wait time. May I ask if your party was complete when you were quoted 25-30 minutes? Unfortunately
column3: we sometimes must skip over you to seat another party that is fully present
column4: which will add more time. This is the only the way to keep our seating system fair.
